products.title: Acacia Red
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Acacia Red Standard Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3000mm (1940mm fabric turned)
 	Min Drop: 300mm Max Drop: 1740mm (3000mm fabric turned)
 	Fabric Joins: If the width is greater than 1940mm and the drop is greater than 1740mm, a horizontal join will be required positioned towards the top of the blind.
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included

products.title: Acacia Red
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Acacia Red Standard Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 500mm Max Drop: 4000mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.title: Acacia Red

products.productdescription:
Min Width: 350mm Max Width: 1400mm
 	Min Drop: 150mm Max Drop: 2000mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Controls: Tensioned system, move bottom bar to raise/lower blind.
